mechanoreception.notes: Likely present as a general sensory modality in flatworms, used for detecting water currents or substrate vibrations, but no specific research found for this family.

chemoreception.notes: Likely present for host detection and orientation, but no specific research found for this family.

photoreception.notes: Presence or absence not determinable from the provided text. Many flatworms have simple eyespots, but this may have been lost in this family.
